Ayesha Khan.description: conversing about meeting for coffee after classes tomorrow and planning to catch up outside of classes by grabbing coffee or going for a walk in the park @ <persona> Wolfgang Schulz
chat: Ayesha Khan
Hey Wolfgang, how was your run at the park?
Wolfgang Schulz
Hey Ayesha, my run was great! How about you, did you have a good start to your morning?
Ayesha Khan
That's great to hear, I'm glad you had a good run. I'm looking forward to my classes at Oak Hill College today.
Wolfgang Schulz
I'm also looking forward to my classes today, it's always a busy but fulfilling day.
Ayesha Khan
We should definitely catch up sometime outside of classes, maybe grab a coffee or go for a walk in the park.
Wolfgang Schulz
That sounds like a great idea, Ayesha. I'd love to catch up outside of classes. Let's plan something soon.
Ayesha Khan
How about we plan to meet for coffee after our classes tomorrow?
Wolfgang Schulz
That sounds like a plan, Ayesha. Let's meet for coffee tomorrow after our classes.
